description:
Gotou Moka is a girl who has a crush on http://anidb.net/ch89594 [Aoyama]. She is good at http://anidb.net/t6975 [lock picking] and has created her own weapon; a baseball bat with nails and cute stickers to protect Aoyama from being dirty. After the soccer club members found out that she has been cleaning the club room, she becomes a manager for the club.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Gotou Moka
